    • Method Detail

      • signOut

        public static void signOut()
        Runs before all tests and signs out any logged in user.

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
        Runs before all tests and creates solo instance. Also navigates to AddBookActivity.

      • removeMockFromFirebase

        public void removeMockFromFirebase()
        Runs after each test to exit from AddBookActivity and remove the test user from Firebase.

      • checkCancel

        public void checkCancel()
        Check if the cancel button redirects to HomeActivity with assertCurrentActivity

      • checkOptions

        public void checkOptions()
        Check if the Change Photo dialog displays the correct options with assertTrue

      • checkNoTitleSave

        public void checkNoTitleSave()
        Check if the title field exists with assertNotNull. Check if the initial string in the title field is "" with assertEquals. Check if saving a book with no title fails with assertCurrentActivity. Check if the user is alerted to the erroneous field with assertTrue.

      • checkNoAuthorSave

        public void checkNoAuthorSave()
        Check if the author field exists with assertNotNull. Check if the initial string in the author field is "" with assertEquals. Check if saving a book with no author fails with assertCurrentActivity. Check if the user is alerted to the erroneous field with assertTrue.

      • checkNoIsbnSave

        public void checkNoIsbnSave()
        Check if the isbn field exists with assertNotNull. Check if the initial string in the isbn field is "" with assertEquals. Check if saving a book with no isbn fails with assertCurrentActivity. Check if the user is alerted to the erroneous field with assertTrue.

      • checkValidSave

        public void checkValidSave()
        Check if erroneous field alert is invisible on valid entry with assertFalse. Check if saving a valid book succeeds with assertCurrentActivity.

      • checkDiscardDialog

        public void checkDiscardDialog()
        Check if user is kept in AddBookActivity when they try to exit but have unsaved edits with assertCurrentActivity. Check if discard dialog appears with assertTrue.

      • checkDiscardDialogDiscard

        public void checkDiscardDialogDiscard()
        Check if user is sent to HomeActivity when they opt to discard their changes with AssertCurrentActivity.

      • checkDiscardDialogKeepEditing

        public void checkDiscardDialogKeepEditing()
        Check if user is kept in AddBookActivity when they opt to keep editing with AssertCurrentActivity.
